item.title: Postgresql: Whitelist IP
item.description: Edit pg_hba.conf file located in /etc/postgresql/{version}/main/pg_hba.conf. Example entry to allow IP Address 10.20.30.40 to connect to test database host test test 10.20.30.40/32 md5 Restart postgresql: sudo service postgresql restart Check if server is running and accepting connections: pg_isready
